info:
If the game has 7 or more players:
Wake up the minions so that they can make eye contact with each other.
Show the 'This is the Demon' card. Point to the Demon.

If the game has 7 or more players:
Show the 'These are your minions' card. Point to each Minion.
Show the Demon Bluffs.
The Poisoner selects a player to poison.
Show the Grimoire to the Spy for as long as they need.
Show the character token of a Townsfolk in play. Point to two players, one of which is that character.

If there are any Outsiders in play:
Show the character token of an Outsider in play. Point to two players, one of which is that character.
Otherwise:
Show the hand signal for number 'zero'.
Show the character token of a Minion in play. Point to two players, one of which is that character.
Show the hand signal for the number of pairs of evil players neighbouring each other.
Show the hand signal for the number of alive evil players neighbouring the Empath.
The Fortune Teller selects two players. Nod 'yes' if one of these players is the Demon or Red Herring. Otherwise shake head 'no'.
The Butler selects a player to be their master.
